Probe â€” is a snapshot of your computer's hardware state and system logs. The tool returns a permanent URL to view the probe of the computer.
The tool is intended to simplify collecting of logs necessary for investigating hardware related issues. Just ask a user to run one simple command to collect all the system logs at once:
sudo hw-probe -all -upload
By creating probes you contribute to the HDD/SSD Real-Life Reliability Test study: https://github.com/linuxhw/SMART
